content.new:
When building the image following [these steps](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim), the image fails to build because there’s the run\_bridge.bash file missing. Should it be the run.bash instead in the Dockerfile?

Step 63/64 : COPY run\_bridge.bash ./  
COPY failed: stat /var/lib/docker/tmp/docker-builder758026822/run\_bridge.bash: no such file or directory

‌

The same happened for the cloud\_sim, I will try changing the run file names.
content.old:
